name: Text Analysis
description: sentiment-analysis, text-summarization, language-detection, article-extraction, named-entity-recognition, extract-text from documents and images

api_methods.name: sentiment-analysis
api_methods.description:
Sentiment analysis is the use of natural language processing to systematically identify and extract subjective information. Sentiment analysis is widely applied to  movie reviews and survey responses.

API spec
-----------
max characters allowed: 1000 chars
supported languages: English

NOTE
--------
Support for other languages will come soon.
The API is free during beta period. Pricing will be updated soon.

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze the sentiment of this movie review?
I need to know if this survey response is positive or negative.
Please perform sentiment analysis on this text.
What is the sentiment of this customer feedback?
Determine the sentiment of this article.
Is this comment expressing a positive or negative sentiment?
Can you tell if this tweet has a positive sentiment?
Analyze the sentiment of this blog post.
I want to know the sentiment of this product review.
Could you check the sentiment of this email?

api_methods.name: named-entity-recognition
api_methods.description: Named entity recognition is a task of information extraction that seeks to locate and classify named entities mentioned in unstructured text into pre-defined categories such as person names, organizations, locations, time expressions, quantities, monetary values, percentages, etc.

utterances.utterance: Can you identify the names of people and organizations in this article?
Extract the locations and dates mentioned in this news report.
What are the key entities in this document?
Find all the monetary values and percentages in this financial report.
Could you list the time expressions and quantities in this text?
Identify the named entities in this email.
What organizations and people are mentioned in this blog post?
Extract the names of places and events from this speech transcript.
Can you find the key entities in this research paper?
List all the named entities in this book excerpt.

api_methods.name: extract-text-from-files
api_methods.description:
Extract text from files like
"csv, doc, docx, eml, epub, json, html, htm, msg, odt, pdf, pptx, ps, rtf, txt, xls, xlsx, gif, jpg, jpeg, png, tiff, tif, mp3, ogg, wav"

[For more information navigate to the Gitlab repository] (https://gitlab.com/t8511/extract-text-from-files-wiki)

utterances.utterance: Can you extract the text from this PDF document?
Please get the text from this image file.
I need the text extracted from this Word document in Spanish.
Extract the text from this Excel file.
Can you pull the text from this HTML file?
Please extract the text from this TIFF image in French.
Get the text from this PowerPoint presentation.
I need the text from this JSON file.
Extract the text from this email file.
Can you extract the text from this MP3 file in German?

api_methods.name: summarize-text
api_methods.description: Summarize a long article, story, etc.

utterances.utterance: Can you give me a brief summary of this article?
Summarize the main points of this story for me.
I need a concise version of this lengthy document.
Could you provide a short summary of this text?
What are the key highlights of this article?
Please summarize this report in a few sentences.
Give me a quick rundown of this piece.
Can you condense this story into a brief summary?
I'd like a summary of this text, please.
What are the essential points of this document?

api_methods.name: language-detection
api_methods.description:
Find out what all languages are present in your text.

API specs
------------
Max chars: 100000
Returns the probabilities of multiple languages.
Follows ISO 639-1 codes
link for the above codes: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes

[For more information visit Gitlab repository](https://gitlab.com/t8511/language-detection-wiki)

utterances.utterance: Can you identify the languages used in this document?
I need to know which languages are present in this text.
What languages can you detect in this paragraph?
Please analyze this text and tell me the languages it contains.
Could you find out the languages in this article?
Detect the languages present in this content for me.
I want to know the languages used in this passage.
Can you tell me what languages are in this text?
Identify the languages in this document, please.
What are the languages present in this text?
